value.string: , Defaulter Master Bot, INFO, Connected to DB
SELECT FORMAT(max([Date Logged]),"dd/mm/yyyy HH:MM:SS"),[Full/Part Time] FROM [Sheet1$] WHERE [Full/Part Time]='Full Time' group by [Full/Part Time]

value.expression: , Defaulter Master Bot, INFO, Max Date Logged $strMaxDateLogged$
SELECT [Revised Weeks] FROM [Sheet1$$] WHERE [Date Logged]= FORMAT("$strMaxDateLogged$","dd/mm/yyyy HH:MM:SS")
, Defaulter Master Bot, INFO, Found Current Week $strPresentWeek$

value.string: Finding the previous six weeks as list

value.expression: , Defaulter Master Bot, INFO, Six weeks list, $strWeekList$

SELECT FORMAT(min([Date Logged]),"dd/mm/yyyy HH:MM:SS"),[Revised Weeks] FROM [Sheet1$$] WHERE [Revised Weeks]  IN ($strWeekList$) AND [Date Logged] <> NULL group by [Revised Weeks] ORDER BY [Revised Weeks]

value.string: Updating the Date Logged column of last six weeks for all employees with these Min(Date Logged)
, Defaulter Master Bot, INFO, Updated Min dates for six weeks
Applying the final filter to find the defaulters and creating the report

value.expression: SELECT [Email - Primary Work] as [Employee Email],[Manager Email],[Preferred Name in Reporting Display Format] as [Employee Name],min([Date Logged]) as DateLogged,[Revised Weeks],min([Current Hire Date]) as Hiredate , SUM([Hours Logged]) as TotalHours, min(SLA) as SLA, [Cost Center - Name],[Cost Center - ID] FROM [Sheet1$$] WHERE Status= 'Active' AND  [Employee / Contingent]='Employee' AND ([Cost Center - Name] LIKE 'IT -%'  OR [Cost Center - Name] LIKE 'Commercial - IT%') AND [Pay Rate Type]='Salary' AND [Revised Weeks] IN ($strWeekList$) AND [Email - Primary Work] NOT IN ($strExcludeEmails$) GROUP BY [Preferred Name in Reporting Display Format],[Email - Primary Work],[Manager Email],[Revised Weeks],[Cost Center - Name],[Cost Center - ID] HAVING min([Current Hire Date])<min([Date Logged]) AND sum([Hours Logged])< min(SLA)

value.string: , Defaulter Master Bot, INFO, Disconnected from DB
Finding the Employee and Manager Employee

, Defaulter Master Bot, INFO, Bot found Employee Emails and Manager emails from the report
, Defaulter Master Bot, INFO, Csv file converted to excel and autofit done
, Defaulter Master Bot, INFO, Defaulter Email Sent successfully
